title: Harry Potter
description: Harry Potter is a fictional character and the main character in the Harry Potter series of novels by J.K. Rowling. Harry is a young wizard with black hair and bright green eyes. He has a lightning bolt-shaped scar on his forehead. Harry is described as small and skinny for his age, with a thin face and knobbly knees. He wears Windsor glasses
